title: Wednesday Post Show (04-13-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (04-13-22)
description:
We get an update from the guy giving Morgan2 getting free stuff from a guy at the grocery store. Amy has another similarity that her son and Bobby share. Bobby talks about the one person who he will never give up his grudge list because of how they wronged him. Raymundo wants to sell an NFT from the show. Raymundo and Bobby try to make a deal. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
